mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userid, userpw, username, email, regdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY regdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userpw = #{userpw}, username=#{username}, email=#{email}, updatedate=sysdate WHERE userid=#{userid}
